website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this a stellar deal on a two-pack of iconic DC Comics super hero toys, these durable action figures are designed to last for many adventures to come.
pros: Includes both Superman and Batman action figures
Based on the “Batman v Superman” film
cons: These heroes have no knee articulation

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Lightning deal. Which meant great deal. The only problem is that they dont bend at the knee and one of Supermans arms is basically glued sloppily so it doesn't move AT ALL. These dolls are cheaply made and are hit or miss in terms of assembly quality and especially the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Dean_J_B

customer_reviews.title: The two little boys I babysit loved running around in there capes with superhero friends in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a Christmas present to go with a Batman cape and and Superman cape that I had found on clearance at end of Halloween. The two little boys I babysit loved running around in there capes with superhero friends in hand. Nice large size, simple design and articulating parts my little ones could move easily. They held them out the window when we drove around my neighborhood looking at Christmas lights and were more entertained watching the dolls capes blow in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Heroic durability and superhero joy for two.
customer_reviews.text: Tough and durable. If my two grandsons ages 4 and 3 couldn’t destroy it no one can. Their joy at seeing the dolls was overwhelming. Each had a preference all along and they do battle for good against evil daily and for hours on end. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sprowls

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 2 year old grandson. They are his favorite toys. He "flies" them off the top of the swing set, buries them in the sandbox, and they shower with him. Capes are still on and in perfect condition. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: It is usually hard to tell if your like me and are a visual person how big an ...
customer_reviews.text: It is usually hard to tell if your like me and are a visual person how big an item is. These two toys were actually a good size not tiny they were about as tall as a Barbie doll if you want a comparison my nephew will love them when I give them to him for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair
customer_reviews.text: This pair of dynamic superhero's was the perfect gift for our grandson. He likes all of the super hero's but I think batman and superman are the ones he truly gravitates too. These dolls are just the right size and are fully poseable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyzuki

customer_reviews.title: Great size!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this character along with 7 of the other characters and this is a pretty amazing size. It's bigger than an average character. I haven't given it to my son yet because it's for a Christmas gift (yes, I shop early for all my gifts lol). You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Two Action Figures in One Package
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a child on our Neighborhood Watch gift tree. He had requested Batman or Superman and I was pleased to see them both featured in one package. The size of figures was good, as well as durability. Price was good. A fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Field

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 4y/o has been SUPER rough on these and they show zero signs of wear or damage. He runs around the house flying them and fighting with his other figures despite me telling him that the JL members do not fight each other haha.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Batman and Superman figure
customer_reviews.text: Value for my money I gave it two stars - but I paid way too much for it. It sells much cheaper In the store I got it for my grandson and he likes Batman and Superman so that’s why I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From Santa
customer_reviews.text: This is what I wanted, its a gift for Christmas. 1 of the family's our KRMC volunteer dept. is sponsoring this year. I'm sure it will bring the spirit of Santa to a 3yr. old
customer_reviews.author: Grimone

customer_reviews.title: These were purchased some time ago.
customer_reviews.text: And here it is summer and he's still playing with them. These are made for bear, man. Your kid won't be destroying these bad boys anytime soon. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Strawder

customer_reviews.title: These guys are the worst. Their heads are cheap junky looking garbage
customer_reviews.text: These guys are the worst. Their heads are cheap junky looking garbage. Make sure you want it before you order it because they charge you to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super super heroes!
customer_reviews.text: These super heroes are 12" figures, articulated at the hips and shoulders, and elbows but not knees. They are well made, the faces are excellent, the capes are thick plastic so they don't flow when they fly, but neither will they rip off or tear up easily. My grandson was more than thrilled to get these for his birthday and in fact my son, who is 11 wanted some, too! This is possible because the price was unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Netshopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The action figures were great in that they were bigger than I thought they would be and a total value for the money. I should have purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: LC2

customer_reviews.title: Super Heros
customer_reviews.text: I THOUGHT I was ordering two stuffed dolls. One of Superman and one of Batman. What I received was two plastic dolls. After checking them out I figured that my two grand kids would love them. They certainly are not huggable, but you can twist them into multiple forms. They are a Mattel product. Yes, bottom line I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. White

customer_reviews.title: Wrap them up right away  to lastmade
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be made to last My 6 year old grand son loves to play with them out side lots of fun .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kamstra

customer_reviews.title: As described/ durability
customer_reviews.text: Got for the 3yr old loves em and ain’t broke yet so works decent size as well exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Franko g.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Decent toys, legs only move at the waist and arms are some what limited in movement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: These have survived a 2-3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, durable, big and have lasted over a year against my son. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product my son throws them around and they still did not break

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little boys!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these a few weeks and their capes are still attached. Lol! I have a 2 and 4 year old that love them. They are well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money! Nothing collectible! Good to play with .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Heros
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Grandson. He wanted super heros and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Debra Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Action figure
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old LOVES these. Great value for the price 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: You get both iconic Superheroes!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big fan of Batman and Superman. Since he's only five, he hasn't seen the Dawn of Justice movie, but he was excited to get these action figures. They have articulation at the neck, shoulder, elbow, wrist and pelvis. These would have been even better if they could bend at the knees. They have fabric capes (probably my son's favorite feature.) The best thing about this set is that you get both of these iconic Superheroes. My son had received the 12" Marvel Spiderman, and happily plays with the three together, and also plays with his older sister and her DC Superhero Girls dolls, who are about the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kuta

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR TODDLERS
customer_reviews.text: excelent buy for toddler, durable, perfect size and very good material
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Action Figures
customer_reviews.text: It's Batman and Superman. What's not to love. Grandson loved it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kovid Goyle

customer_reviews.title: Unbroken.
customer_reviews.text: I like the moving parts, arms and legs. Cape is kinda cheaply made, but the rest of the toy has held up a month.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find anywhere. Good quality and fully poseable. My two and a half year old loves superheroes and was so thrilled and happy to get these. Since they are bigger they are hard to lose and leave behind. That's especially good since he takes them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cubero

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for a five year old boy. "WINNER" I also purchased Spiderman. He plays with these figures regularly. I am always pleased when I don't waste money. The figures are large and sturdy and seem to withstand being thrown across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Cwb

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and was a favorite. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality like Dollar Tree quality thank good it was a gift for a five year old
customer_reviews.author: Silvie

customer_reviews.title: These toys are very lightweight so they feel like they might be cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These toys are very lightweight so they feel like they might be cheaply made, but they are not. Between my 9-year-old and 4-year-old, they can take a beating. I bought these on a Deal of the Day and it was worth it. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: courtney clark

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Well made, perfect details and really flexible too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelebethb

customer_reviews.title: ... old nephew to go with all his others he loved them and the action figure/ toys them selves are ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little damaged if your a collector that might be something to consider but I brought these for my 3yr old nephew to go with all his others he loved them and the action figure/ toys them selves are great condition and durable for kids play.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who loves all things comic books and superheros. These and others like it have become his most prized toys! Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Super durable and poseable. Stand alone and kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product! They do not stand up very easier, you have to stand them up just right for them to stay!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L.

customer_reviews.title: My nephew didn't mind he's only 4 but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These items looked fake to me. Batman had paint missing from his head. Packaging and clear plastic viewing window were scratched up and looked old. I would have sent back but I needed it for a birthday that day. My nephew didn't mind he's only 4 but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have played with these toys for over a year. They have yet to break anything on them and that is saying something! Actually if you are a parent reading this I think that's all that needs to be said to prove they are worth the buy! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ald23

customer_reviews.title: Getting the product to the consumer quickly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly but I don't know anything about it, as I buy gifts for people who otherwise couldn't for their families
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: See in store before buying
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, not full motion, odd articulation. No knee joints. Characters seem to always do the splits but not much else. My kid isn't enjoying them nearly as much as others.
customer_reviews.author: autotkgrad

customer_reviews.title: good looking action figure for money especially
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son he loves them when hes interested
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: He also got a smaller more rubber set that he uses a little more often but these are very sturdy and price was good too
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is very please with these. He also got a smaller more rubber set that he uses a little more often but these are very sturdy and price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Bmill

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Batman's arm broke irreparably 5 minutes out of the box
customer_reviews.author: RachaelMS83

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids or Collector!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for displaying/collecting. They look like decent quality, not cheap looking. Any kid or collector would like these two figures as a gift. They look like they'd do well with rough playing. Will be purchasing again for out of the box display!

customer_reviews.title: Great price great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old grandson loves them and cant stop playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Medina

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend!!!! My toddler boys love these and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very hard plastic so not easily broken. The capes are on very well and don't seem like they can be torn off. I have 2 & 3 y/o boys and they are very hard on their toys, but these are in great shape a year later. I purchased a few other action figures from Wal-Mart and the quality of these are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toy Figures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter and she enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: FabGeekMom

customer_reviews.title: I feel like these blow the Marvel characters that are at a ...
customer_reviews.text: While also fairly simple, I feel like these blow the Marvel characters that are at a similar price point out of the water. Just simply having more options besides moving legs forward and back makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: STLNic

customer_reviews.title: Good DC COMIC fighting duo set for children.
customer_reviews.text: Cool size for my nephew to play with. You can pose them in a few different ways and they seem sturdy enough for rough play. The package was well protected when it arrived. Very pleased with the delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Little Boys Delight
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is obsessed with super heros. This was a good value and his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: karen eff

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my two-year old who loves Batman ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year old who loves Batman and my four-year old who loves Superman. They are a lot bigger than I thought it was going to be. On the bright side, at least they are too big to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd246

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my 3 year old. HE LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year old. HE LOVES THEM and so do I!!! I have already ordered another superhero since ordering this one, from the same company. I will continue to use this company/seller even after my son gets older, for gifts for other little boys.
customer_reviews.author: Candy B

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these action figues
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these action figues. They can love the legs and arm in many different directions not just up and down. The size is nice and large so they don't get misplaced.

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these! They get lots of play time!

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid and seem to be quality. However, as others have mentioned they do not bend at the knee. This seriously limits the positions you can put them into. Other than that, solid item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Son enjoyed these figurines. He has other 12" super heroes and needed Batman and Superman. These were cheaper on Amazon than in any store I found. Would buy again if needed.

customer_reviews.title: BvS accurate

product_meta.title: DC Comics Batman V Superman Batman & Superman Figure 2 Pack [Amazon Exclusive], Model Number: DLN32
product_meta.description: Celebrate the Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice movie and recreate the greatest Super hero battle of all time with this 2-pack of deluxe 12" Batman and Superman action figures. Each features 9 points of articulation, true to movie battle suits and cloth capes. Pit The two DC Comics Super heroes against each other and see who will reign victorious! Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Celebrate the new Batman V. Superman
From the Dawn of Justice movie
The greatest superhero battle of all time
